name: Monster Gauntlet
description:
Top down shooter, kill enemies and survive as long as you can. WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

Main art assets from Kenney:https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tiny-dungeon

Pixellari font: https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font

Heart pixel art: https://opengameart.org/content/heart-pixel-art
